name: community_post_comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Retrieves comments for a YouTube community post using the specified cursor token.

cursor.description: A token used for pagination to fetch the next set of comments from the Community Post Details endpoint.
